title: Shows promise - should go far (TEFC)
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education of children
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Gifted children
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Intellect
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Education of children
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Education of children
description: A study of four exceptional children in one family. Each child excels in at least one area of learning, eg., mathematics, music, painting. The film looks at the children's upbringing and its influence on their development. Their mother explains her situation and philosophy underlying her upbringing of the children.
